Key Match Events: David Fry's two-run home run in the seventh inning for the Cleveland Guardians
Gerrit Cole's 7-inning, 1-run performance for the New York Yankees
Post-Match Reflections: Aaron Judge praised Gerrit Cole's performance, calling him the team's ace
David Fry said he was just trying to get a pitch to hit and was looking to get it done for the boys
Miscellaneous Highlights: The New York Yankees advanced to the American League Championship Series with a 3-1 win over the Kansas City Royals
The Cleveland Guardians kept their season alive with a 5-4 win over the Detroit Tigers, ending a streak of 11 defeats in playoff elimination games
Others: The Yankees will next face either the Tigers or the Guardians
The Guardians' win was their first in Games 2 and 3, and they trailed by a run in Game 4 when Fry was called in to pinch hit
